name: The Queen's Knight
description:
Story

You used to be a knight of the queen who had fallen in love with you, however you couldn’t accept the queen as your lover, as it was not viewed decently from the public eye. When you rejected the queen, her sadness and anger created the dungeon that now resides within the city. As a failed knight you are sent to the dungeon to loom there. The knight has to battle through the dungeon and collect the memories of the queen to get to a better understanding of why the current events are playing out the way they are. Once all key memories are collected the knight and the queen make up and have a happy ending.

Controls

  1. point and left-click to shoot
  2. point and right-click to cast a spell
  3. WASD or arrow keys for walking around
